```{r}
TRAIN_SIZE <- 5000
K <- 3
K_FOLD_REPEAT <- 1

library(randomForest)
library(doMC)
library(Metrics)

registerDoMC(cores = 4)
```

# Feature subset and pre-processing
```{r}
# Feature selection
train_data <- sample_n(raw_data, TRAIN_SIZE) %>%
  select(interest_level
         , bathrooms
         , bedrooms
         , latitude
         , longitude
         #, price
         , log_price
         #, log_price_per_bedroom_p1
         #, log_price_per_bathroom_p1
         #, log_price_per_room_p2
         , nb_features
         #, logp1_nb_features
         #, created_mday
         , created_wday
         #, created_hour
         , nb_photos
         #, logp1_nb_photos
         )

# Normalization parameters
pre_process_ctrl <- preProcess(train_data, method = c("center", "scale"))
```
